description: This Dart test file defines widget tests for navigation behaviors within a Flutter application. It includes a minimal test screen, tests for imperative push/pop operations, named route navigation, and back button behavior.

classes.name: _TestSecondScreen
classes.description: A minimal stateless widget used for testing navigation, displays a label and a button to pop the route.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the test suite, runs various widget tests for navigation.
